description: Ice Blast allows you to use the power of ice against your foes, with a tendency to Slow their attacks and movement.

description.long: Ice Bolt quickly pelts an enemy with small icy daggers; their chill Slows a foe's attacks and movement for a time. Fast, but little damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast
Ice Blast hurls shards of ice at foes and Slows their attacks and movement for a time. Slower recharge than Ice Bolt, but more damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
Unleashes a cone of frosty breath that can Slow your opponents' movement and attacks. Very accurate and very deadly at medium range. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow
Greatly increases the chance to hit of your attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long
Freeze Ray encases your foe in a block of ice, holding them helpless in place for a while. While frozen, your foe will take Cold damage over time.  Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

description.short: Ranged (Location AoE), Minor DoT(Cold, Lethal), Foe -Recharge, -SPD
description.long: Shred your foes with this Ice Storm. This power deals a lot of damage in a large area and can Slow all affected targets movement and attack speed. Damage: Minor(DoT), Recharge: Long

A slower yet more powerful version of Ice Blast, Bitter Ice Blast deals much more damage and can also reduce your enemy's chance to hit. Like other Ice Blast powers, Bitter Ice Blast can Slow a target's movement and attack speed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

This power can Hold your opponent frozen solid in a block of ice. The victim can be attacked and will remain frozen and helpless. After the ice thaws, the victim emerges chilled and Slowed.  Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

description.short: Ranged (Location AoE), Extreme DoT(Cold), Foe -To Hit, -SPD, -Recharge, Knockback
description.long: You can conjure a Blizzard that inflicts Extreme Cold and Lethal damage over time and can Slow the attack rate of all your opponents in a large area, reducing their chance to hit and possibly knocking them back.  Damage: Extreme(DoT), Recharge: Very Long
